alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 1:59PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches across lower elevations, 12 to 24 inches over mountain passes, and up to 30 inches in the mountains above pass level. Winds gusting as 60 mph. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible at times, and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure that they have the appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds combined with the heavy, wet snow could cause damage to power lines, and possibly cause a few power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
